OOC: Shivah it's male

Shivah:

The young male smiled, soon his troop would be good warriors and all 
was acoording to his plans "Yes Trainer..." reply calmed the bot "I 
guess that you desire to know your quarters..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Prebon was evily happy (If that makes sense.) He was now unit 
commander of the Drackotrons and Shivah didn't seem to mind handing 
them over to him. "Let me check the information in my quarters and 
We'll begin training in the morning." You'd better get some rest, I 
will not tolerate slackers in my unit." He stepped closer, stood 
straight up and got within a foot of Shivahs face, "AND FROM HERE ON 
OUT YOU WILL REFER TO ME BY MY RANK OF TRAINER, AND WILL ANSWER TO 
YOUR NEW TITLE OF GRUNT, IS THAT UNDERSTOOD GRUNT!!!" It was a bold 
move but he had to be sure that they both knew that he wasn't going 
to be light on her.
